{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-07-09T20:01:50.000Z", "description": "

Software Engineer - GPU Compute: Full-time/ Part-time/ Contract-to-Hire


Qualifications

  • Strong knowledge of C++ and experience in large code bases
  • Strong knowledge of CUDA as applied to recent GPU microarchitectures (e.g., Volta, Turing)
  • BS in computer science or related field
  • Strong knowledge of 3D geometry and linear algebra
  • Experiencing debugging and optimizing GPU kernels using tools like nvprof and the Visual Profiler
  • Comfortable in Linux development environments
